revised_title: Hydatides Voided per Vaginam: A Case Study
tldr: A 48-year-old woman experiences symptoms of conception, followed by the discharge of a significant amount of blood and hydatids per vaginam. The hydatids are found to be similar in appearance to the ovary of a boiled hen, with a transparent, bile-colored substance. The woman recovers her health after the discharge of these hydatids.
